name: Atkin Associates LLC
what_you_do: Atkin Associates offers practical marketing, planning, fundraising, and strategy services for growing businesses and nonprofits.
who_you_serve: Atkin Associates has served hundreds of clients in human services, sports, technology, healthcare, and publishing.
social_proof: Barrie Atkin has over 25 years of consulting experience and is a Harvard MBA.
business_focus: Atkin Associates provides strategic planning, marketing and branding, fundraising, new product development, aging services, and speaking/inspiration services.
service_provided: strategic planning, marketing and branding, fundraising, new products, aging services, speaking
